page.title: 07GOING TO WORK 2
page.content: Conclusions : More people work at Perkins than in Derek Crouch or shops. This information is not accurate because more than one dad is in more than one category. Then we went round and asked "What's your mum's job?" Here's the replies: 48 housewives. 38 other (includes crossing ladies, cleaners, newspaper workers, sugar beat workers, wine makers, hair dressers and cleaner at Eyebury motors) 16 factory workers 12 shop workers, 4 cooks, 3 at Derek Crouch, 2 teachers, 1 at Odams Mill , 1 social worker, 1 post lady 1 Warden Conclusions: there are more mums that go to work than are housewives
